name: Itachi-Uchiha-Md
description: A WhatsApp bot based on Baileysjs with Multi-Device support

BOTNAME.description: Name of your bot. Ex: - Itachi Uchiha

PREFIX.description: set your bot prefix here ex:- '.'

AUTHOR.description: set your bot author name here

STICKER.description: set your bot sticker package name ex:- 1999namezo

PM_BLOCKER.description: type True for enable Pm blocker

WELCOME.description: Type True for enable welcome message
